EmailTemplate.name: LI Tax Issue Resolved
EmailTemplate.subject: Tax Issue Resolved
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear License Holder,
The tax issue has been resolved and you can proceed with the application. Please see the attached brochure to assist you in the online renewal. As noted in the brochure, you must first create an online account and associate the commercial activity license. The following information will be required: Activity License #: XXXX City of Philadelphia Tax Account #: XXXX Social Security Number (SSN) OR Employer Identification Number (EIN): XXXX
Alternatively, you can visit our eCLIPSE Registrations counter located on the MSB Concourse, between the hours of 8 am and 3:30 pm. We apologize for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience.
Please reply to this email if you experience any further issues related to this. We appreciate your patience and thank you for your investment in the City of Philadelphia.
Sincerely, Customer Care Staff Department of L & I
